hispana: ^C. COLUMBUS and his crew arrive on an unknown island and are weary from their journey.
^"Land Ho!" COLUBUS yells. He and his men anchor the ship on the shore and find the island inhabited by strange people.
^The natives ask "Who goes there? What are you oing on our island?"

s: ^"How do you do? We are but sea faring explorers who stumbled across your shores. We mean you no harm.

astonished: ^"You are in jest!" I told him in dignified affront. "You make mock of me, Monsieur."
nod: ^I dabbed curtly, not believing a word of it.
ending: ^"We shall circumnavigate the globe within eighty days." He was quite calm as he proposed this wild scheme. "We leave for Paris on the 8:25. In an hour."
